data.prayer: Father, help the 790,099 believers in Rio Grande do Norte to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,378,001 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Rio Grande do Norte.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Paiaku people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 790,099 believers in Rio Grande do Norte, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 3,168,100 people living in Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 790,099 believers in the state of Rio Grande do Norte with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
